<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new DICT claim"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/claim"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This operation is performed by the claiming participant at the request of the end user.
The current bond remains unchanged until confirmed by the donor PSP.

Not every type of key can be claimed or ported. The table below defines the possibilities:

   | compatible? | OWNERSHIP | PORTABILITY |
   |---------------|:----------:|:------------:|
   | CPF | | ✓ |
   | CNPJ | | ✓ |
   | PHONE | ✓ | ✓ |
   | EMAIL | ✓ | ✓ |
   | EVP | | |

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixDICTClaimCreateRequest","description":"Request to use to create a new DICT claim.","required":["accountType","accountNumber","branch","key","name","taxId","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"accountNumber":{"description":"Account number, including check digit. If the check digit is a letter, replace it with 0.","pattern":"[0-9]{1,20}","type":"string"},"accountType":{"description":"Account type, as domain dictionary for SPI message pacs.008.","enum":["CACC","SLRY","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string"},"branch":{"description":"Agency, without check digit. Must respect the pattern '[0-9]{1,4}'.","type":"string"},"key":{"description":"Addressing key. Must be a CPF, CNPJ, E-mail or Phone.\n\n\nCPF: ^[0-9]{11}$\n\nCNPJ: ^[0-9]{14}$\n\nE-mail: Valid W3C HTML5 e-mail address\n\nPhone: ^\\+[1-9][0-9]\\d{1,14}$","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"The account owner full name.","type":"string"},"taxId":{"description":"The account owner tax id. Must be a valid CPF or CNPJ.","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Claim type","enum":["OWNERSHIP","PORTABILITY"],"type":"string"},"tradeName":{"description":"The trade name when owner is LEGAL_PERSON.","pattern":"^([A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿ,.@:&*+_<>()!?/\\\\$%\\d' -]+)$","type":"string"}},"example":{"accountNumber":"0007654321","accountType":"CACC","branch":"0001","key":"+5561988887777","name":"Joao Silva","taxId":11122233300,"type":"OWNERSHIP"}},"examples":{"CreatePixDICTClaimRequest":{"value":{"type":"OWNERSHIP","key":"+5561988887777","branch":"0001","accountNumber":"2227654330","accountType":"CACC","taxId":"23452233301","name":"Antonio Jose Raimundo"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
